snippet: Catherine Greig, longtime mistress of James (Whitey) Bulger, admitted to helping him elude the police for years, but it is not clear whether she will be made to testify against him.
abstract: Catherine E Greig, the longtime girlfriend of the crime boss James (Whitey) Bulger, is sentenced to eight years in prison for her role in helping him elude the authorities during the 16 years the two spent in hiding; it is not clear whether she will be made to testify against him.
lead_paragraph: Catherine Greig, longtime mistress of James (Whitey) Bulger, admitted to helping him elude the police for years, but it is not clear whether she will be made to testify against him.

headline.seo: Girlfriend of Whitey Bulger Gets 8-Year Prison Sentence
headline.main: Girlfriend of Crime Boss Gets 8-Year Prison Sentence
headline.print_headline: Girlfriend of Crime Boss Is Given 8-Year Sentence
